document_data.name: Aelar
document_data.mainbody:
'''Aelar''' was a [[druid]] of the [[Emerald Grove]] ''circa'' the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|None of this feels real. Not yet.}}
document_data.Relationships: Aelar served under [[Archdruid]] [[Halsin]] and for a time, the secret [[Shadow Druid]] [[Kagha]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Archdruid Halsin left the Emerald Grove left his people on a journey to investigate the goings on of the [[cult of the Absolute]]. When Kagha was put in charge, she immediately tasked Aelar and the other druids with commencement of the ''[[Rite of Thorns]]'', a ritual that would hide the grove away from outsiders and protect them from the growing threat of [[goblinoid]] raids.
